data.text:
This first time very comfy hotel and location is good we woluld like to thanks reception Asanka for quick checkout and overall my stay is fantastic thank you for premier inn dubi silicon we will back near future 

Resturant also goid serving good food thank you
data.title: Quick Checkout very smooth Thanks to Asanka

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valuable guest 

Thank you for sharing your positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Premier Inn Dubai Silicon Oasis. We are delighted to hear that you found our hotel comfortable and well-located. I will personally pass on your thanks to Asanka at the reception.
It's wonderful to know that you had a fantastic stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back shortly. 
Additionally, we appreciate your compliments on our restaurant's food and service. 
Thank you for choosing Premier Inn, and we can't wait to host you again soon!

Best regards,

Peter Farhan
Operations Manager
owner_response.author: Peter Farhan

Dear Hager

Thank you for sharing your positive feedback on Premier Inn Dubai Silicon Oasis. 
We're thrilled to hear that you find our hotel and rooms nice and that you've received cheerful and friendly service from our staff.

We take pride in ensuring our guests' needs are met efficiently and effectively.
Hamza, Mehyar, and Hala are delighted to hear your kind words. We strive to maintain a friendly and welcoming atmosphere, and it's heartening to hear that our staff's smiles and greetings have made a positive impression on you.

Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to continue exceeding your expectations throughout the rest of your stay. If you need anything further, please don't hesitate to let us know.

Best regards,

Peter Farhan
Operations Manager

data.text: I had a very disappointing experience during my stay at this hotel. The overall condition of the hotel is desperately in need of renovation. It is evident that the employees lack basic manners and proper training in health and safety protocols. The hotel seems to be a breeding ground for infections. Despite booking two rooms for a week-long stay, we decided to check out a day earlier due to various issues. The hotel is clearly facing structural problems, and the entire staff gives off an unwelcoming vibe. When we checked out early, we were met with indifference from the five employees who were busy chatting at the reception. None of them bothered to inquire about our early departure or apologize for the dirty room and the flea bites my son suffered from. I have never encountered such laziness and poor quality in any Premier Inn across the country. I strongly advise against staying here. Although the manager attempted to accommodate us by offering different rooms, even the supposedly better rooms were extremely unclean. The only positive aspect of this hotel is the pub, Mr. Toads, which serves delicious food. However, it is evident that the pub is managed separately from the hotel.
data.title: Unsanitary Conditions and Communication Issues: A Ground for Infections and Ineffective Staff.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Neli 

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your review about your recent stay in Premier InnDubai Silicon Oasis.

We are deeply sorry for the disappointing experience you faced during your recent stay at our hotel. Your feedback regarding the condition of our property not meeting your expectations and the shortcomings in the service provided by our staff is truly concerning to us.

I am surprised by your comments about our staff's manners, as our team has extensive training to ensure they meet the expectations of our valued guests, and our team they are specialist in spreading welcoming vibes.

Upon investigating your concerns, it came to my attention that when you raised the issue of cleanliness in your room, our Housekeeping Manager promptly met with you, apologized, and immediately arranged for you to be moved to another room.
The cleanliness of the alternative room was thoroughly inspected, and a courtesy call was made from our reception team to ensure your satisfaction, which unfortunately was not mentioned at the time to allow us the opportunity to rectify any further concerns.

Please rest assured that we take health and safety matters seriously, and our team members receive ongoing training to ensure they are well-equipped with the necessary skills and knowledge to maintain our standards.

Regarding your son's discomfort, we promptly relocated you to another room in line with our health and safety protocols. It's important to note that our hotel has a comprehensive disinfection system in place, and the first room has been thoroughly inspected. However, no infection has been found to be the cause of any discomfort or itches.
While we understand your concern, we would like to assure you that this is not indicative of any issues within our facilities, since the room was occupied by more than one person.
We take the well-being of our guests very seriously and strive to maintain a clean and safe environment at all times.

Upon further investigation, it was noted that both rooms were not checked out through reception, thus our team had no opportunity to inquire about your reasons for leaving. Although your departure on March 5th at 19:22 was earlier than anticipated, it does not technically classify as an early departure as your reservation was scheduled until March 6th.

We appreciate your positive feedback regarding our pub, Mr. Toads, and we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the food there.

Rest assured that your concerns have been shared with our management team, and immediate steps will be taken to address them. Your feedback is invaluable to us as it assists us in improving and providing a better experience for all our guests.

Best regards,

Peter Farhan
Operations Manager
owner_response.author: Peter Farhan

data.text:
I really liked my stay, the staff was professional, the rooms very clean.
Nelson Mehiar and Hamza were extremely nice to us
The bar also serves very nice food and we can watch the games of all kind of sports 
I really recommend this hotel it is one of the best in Silicon Oasis
data.title: Stay review

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valuable guest,

Thank you for your wonderful feedback on Premier Inn Dubai Silicon Oasis!

We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found our staff to be professional and our rooms exceptionally clean.

Nelson, Mehiar, and Hamza will be delighted to know that their exceptional service made your stay memorable. We take great pride in providing top-notch service to our guests.

It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed the food served at our bar and appreciated the opportunity to watch various sports games. We strive to create an enjoyable and comfortable experience for all our guests.

Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we're honored to be considered one of the best hotels in Silicon Oasis. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future! 

Best Regards,

Peter Farhan
Operations Manager
owner_response.author: Peter Farhan
